code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant K as Klipper
    participant APO as Auto Power Off
    participant T as Timer (Reactor)
    participant P as Power Device

    Note over APO,T: Timer initiation
    alt Print completed
        K->>APO: _handle_print_complete()
    else START command
        U->>K: AUTO_POWEROFF START
        K->>APO: cmd_AUTO_POWEROFF(option="start")
    end
    
    APO->>T: reactor.register_timer(_check_conditions, waketime)
    APO->>APO: Record countdown_end
    
    loop Until shutdown or cancellation
        T-->>APO: _check_conditions(eventtime)
        
        alt Conditions not met
            APO->>T: Return new delay (+60s)
        else Conditions met
            APO->>APO: _power_off()
            APO->>P: Actual device shutdown
            APO->>T: Return NEVER (end timer)
        end
    end
    
    opt Manual cancellation
        U->>K: AUTO_POWEROFF CANCEL
        K->>APO: cmd_AUTO_POWEROFF(option="cancel")
        APO->>T: reactor.unregister_timer(shutdown_timer)
        APO->>APO: shutdown_timer = None
    end
    
    opt Cancellation by print detection
        Note over K,APO: Print started
        APO->>APO: Print detection in _check_conditions
        APO->>T: Return NEVER (end timer)
    end
